THIS IS THE PLACE TO GO! The only pizza place that I know that has their slices under $2. Everywhere else I go to are $2.50 to $3.25 and I have been coming here as of late. The slices are a decent size but nothing to complain about and I come all the way from Kingsbridge Road (197th University) to buy here because it IS worth it and the large pizza pies are $10 and you won't find that price anywhere else as all the pizza places I go to now have the large pies for $15 to $20 which is ridiculous. To me it is worth the trip because if it wasn't, I wouldn't be typing out this review here. To hell with all the pizza spots here on Kingsbridge Road and Bedford Park, this is the one I will be going to from now on.

I mean, you have one slice of pizza for $1 dollar. It was really good pizza and big.

We bought 4 slices, 2 with cheese and 2 with pepperoni. 2 can of soda. We paid 7 dollars. Is there a way you can find that somewhere else? I am not sure actually.

About quality of the pizza, I liked it. I mean, for one dollar, I think you are getting more than what you are paying for.

Location looked decently clean, no big deal. No many seats if you wanna eat inside, but take out is always an option.

Definitely would go again. For sure.

I've visited classy restaurants where Pizza are sold for $5-$7 a slice but Bronx Pizza is the best pizza I've tasted in a long time and the price is so reasonable That I end up buying the entire Pie with pepperoni for only $6. I wish I can give this place more than 5 stars.

Love the pizza but bought a bad slice...the cheese tasted bad and sour...I know what fresh cheese taste like and I had a sour cheeseburger pizza...tried to talk to the manager bout the bad slice...he started yelling at me and said I was the only one who complained about the pizza...In another words, get out of here have a nice day...never got another slice or my money back...very nasty attitude and unprofessional conduct...the pizza has been sitting there for more than 2hours...that means it's garbage...anything sitting or left out more than 2 hours...is "GARBAGE"...remember that folks...start second guessing where you buy a slice of pizza for $1....
